text: Khabaradara! Tame te loko cho ke allahana margamam kharca karava mate bolavavamam avo cho, to tamara manthi ketalaka kanjusa'i karava lage che ane je kanjusi kare che te to asalamam potana jiva sathe kanjusi kare che, allaha ta'ala gani (apeksa-mukta) che ane tame phakira cho. Ane jo tame modhum pheravi leso to te tamara vati tamara vagara bija lokone lavase je tamara jeva nahim hoya
